            let's get breakfast< >you pick the place

POS 0 11,3

DLG a
                how about thai?< >eh, too spicy

DLG b
     i heard this place is good< >...looks expensive

DLG c
             this place's cheap< >yeah, but it's gross

DLG d
           what about this one?< >the line-up's too long

DLG e
            this one's close by< >we go here all the time though

DLG f
                       chinese?< >for breakfast??

DLG g
          this diner looks nice< >i've been there, it's not

DLG h
     how about we cook at home?< >that's lame

DLG i
        do you want to go here?< >hmm, not really

DLG j
                     haha yeah?< >haha no

END 0
             but we went anyway< >we got lunch instead

END 1
             but we went anyway< >it was gross

END 2
             but we went anyway< >it was too spicy

END 3
             but we went anyway< >they weren't even open

END 4
             but we went anyway< >we didn't have reservations

END 5
             but we went anyway< >haha no we didn't

END 6
             but we went anyway< >it was luxurious

END 7
             but we went anyway< >it wasn't great

END 8
             but we went anyway< >it was forgettable

END 9
             but we went anyway< >...again
